commit message: Added tag 1.76 for changeset 0db7133e8e75
Formatting...
Dropped support for android versions below 4.0 (Api-Level 14), no more development will be done for older versions.

Remove all compatibility-related stuff for old android versions below api level 14:
- Removed Actionbarsherlock from all themes
- Removed special treatment in values-v11
- Removed support-library
- Removed all calls to Actionabrsherlock-Api
- Use new MotionEvent-Api
Fixed locking-problem
Completing German translation
Typo in English strings
Thanks updated
Added and unified all license statements, removed unnecessary license text
First attempt to implement a menuitem which filters on articles that have images preloaded
First attempt to implement a menuitem which filters on articles that have images preloaded
- Fixed problems with image cache and skipped downloads
Push to API-Level 21
Add notice regarding deprecation of old http-connector

- Move old connection method into 'deprecated' package
- Use new SSLSocketFactoryEx to allow only sane choices of ciphers and protocols
- Tidy up initialization of SSL-Stuff
Typo
Disabled SSLv3 because of the POODLE vulnerability (http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2014-3566)
CHANGELOG, Thanks, Manifest
Fixed #258 ('1.77 fails to connect to TLS site - SSL errors ') by allowing more cipher suites for TLS
Fixed #258 ('1.77 fails to connect to TLS site - SSL errors ') by allowing more cipher suites for TLS

== Version 1.77 (1) ==
* Added support for TLS v1.3, dropped support for SSL v3
* Fixed problems with ImageCache not downloading images
* Added menuitem to filter 'articles with cached images'
* Fixed some locking problems
* Updated translations, license statements and thanks
* Dropped support for android versions below 4.0 (Api-Level 14)
* Fixed SSL problems (Issue #258)
